idea.content:
The general Idea was to create a platform through which you could control a rc-car over your browser.

You plug your Smartphone into the rc-car and connect it with the Audio plug.

A Arduino-Board serves as the Interface between the Smartphone and the car. The Smartphone submits controller signals over the Audio Interface to the Arduino-Board. The Arduino Board converts these signals and transmits them to the rc-car's electronic circuit.

No native application is necessary, thanks to WebRTC the application is implemented as a pure Web App (exluding the Arduino-Board).

attention.content:
As this project uses API's which are under heavy development at the moment, you should use the newest version of Chrome Beta.

Activate following flags (chrome://flags):

  • Enable WebRTC
  • Enable experimental WebSocket implementation

For further details: GitHub
